name: agentscript
description: Minimalist Agent Based Modeling (ABM) framework based on NetLogo
author: Owen Densmore

scripts.git-pull: git checkout gh-pages && git pull && git checkout master && git pull
scripts.git-diff: git status; git diff Gulpfile.js LICENSE README.md package.json src extras models sketches
scripts.git-prep: git checkout master && gulp all && git add . && git status
scripts.git-commit: git checkout master && git commit -v && git push origin master
scripts.git-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
